item.title: Can't load pxrUSD.mll and AL_USDMayaTestPlugin
item.description:
Describe the issue

After I finish the maya-usd instalation, I add as enviroment variables MAYA_MODULE_PATH: D:-usdand Tried to load all plugins from Plugin Manager and I get the following errors

** Script Editor** "# Error: file: C:/Program Files/Autodesk/Maya2020/scripts/others/pluginWin.mel line 317: ImportError: file line 1: No module named UsdMaya # // Error: file: C:/Program Files/Autodesk/Maya2020/scripts/others/pluginWin.mel line 317: initializePlugin function failed (pxrUsd) // "

// Error: file: C:/Program Files/Autodesk/Maya2020/scripts/others/pluginWin.mel line 317: Unable to dynamically load : D:/USD/maya-usd/install/RelWithDebInfo/plugin/al/plugin/AL_USDMayaTestPlugin.mll Error en una rutina de inicialización de biblioteca de vínculos dinámicos (DLL). // // Error: file: C:/Program Files/Autodesk/Maya2020/scripts/others/pluginWin.mel line 317: Error en una rutina de inicialización de biblioteca de vínculos dinámicos (DLL). (AL_USDMayaTestPlugin) //

Output Widnow error detected in .....cpp at line 132 : (kFailure): Unexpected Internal Failure Coding Error: in Define at line 150 of D:.cpp – Multiple definitions of TfEnvSetting variable detected. This is usually due to software misconfiguration. Contact the build team for assistance. (duplicate ‘PIXMAYA_ENABLE_BOUNDING_BOX_MODE’) Coding Error: in Define at line 150 of D:.cpp – Multiple definitions of TfEnvSetting variable detected. This is usually due to software misconfiguration. Contact the build team for assistance. (duplicate ‘PIXMAYA_USE_USD_ASSEM_NAMESPACE’)

API error detected in .....cpp at line 132
(kFailure): Unexpected Internal Failure

// Error: file: C:/Program Files/Autodesk/Maya2020/scripts/others/pluginWin.mel line 317: initializePlugin function failed (AL_USDMayaTestPlugin)

API error detected in .....cpp at line 132
(kFailure): Unexpected Internal Failure

Build log

Specs: - OS & version Windows 10 - Compiler & version [e.g. gcc 6.3.1] - Maya version Maya 2020

Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

item.title: Not sure im going the stage test correctly
item.description:
Describe the bug Please See attatched txt file. I am trying to run my build with –stage=test like this: python build.py --maya-location /usr/autodesk/maya2021 --pxrusd-location $SCRIPT_DIR/USD --devkit-location $SCRIPT_DIR/maya_devkit/devkitBase --stages=test $SCRIPT_DIR/WorkspaceRefractor alas it doesn’t do the test, looks pretty unhappy. Not sure whats up.

Attachments build_log.txt

Specs (if applicable): - OS & version [Linux centos 7.7] - Compiler & version [ gcc 6.3.1] - Maya version [Maya 2021/Maya beta PR117] - Maya USD commit SHA [ dev at 6210a2a] - Pixar USD commit SHA [20.08]

Additional context First time trying this in awhile has never worked for me before. Any help would be appreciated. Sue
